title: Medical Simulation-Based Team Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: A course for medical device manufacturing managers, focusing on team collaboration simulations based on real-world medical scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can perform team-based decision-making with 80% or higher accuracy in medical simulation environments
Learners can improve their confidence in handling crisis situations by 50% or more through repeated simulation practice
Learners can analyze real medical incident cases using PBL methods and propose three or more improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
